descriptionNullable:
### Context


This folder contains data from the CrossCheck study. The CrossCheck study was a year-long study to find digital indicators of relapse for individuals who have Schizophrenia Spectrum Disorders (SSDs). This version of the data is de-identified, contains only the smartphone arm of the study, and has been approved for public use.


### Content

There are three files in this directory, that may be of use to you:

* Eureka Data Dictionary Daily and Hourly v1 08212020.xlsx: Gives an overview of the columns found within both the daily/hourly data files
* CrossCheck\_Daily\_Data.csv: Daily behavioral features
* CrossCheck\_Hourly\_Data\_v1\_08212020.csv.gz: Hourly behavioral features

### Other Links

https://pbh.tech.cornell.edu/data.html

Rui Wang, Weichen Wang, Min S. H. Aung, Dror Ben-Zeev, Rachel Brian, Andrew T. Campbell, Tanzeem Choudhury, Marta Hauser, John Kane, Emily A. Scherer, and Megan Walsh. 2017. [Predicting Symptom Trajectories of Schizophrenia using Mobile Sensing](https://www.cs.dartmouth.edu/~ruiwang/crosscheck_bprs.pdf). Proc. ACM Interact. Mob. Wearable Ubiquitous Technol. 1, 3, Article 110 (September 2017), 24 pages.

Rui Wang, Min S. H. Aung, Saeed Abdullah, Rachel Brian, Andrew T. Campbell, Tanzeem Choudhury, Marta Hauser, John Kane, Michael Merrill, Emily A. Scherer, Vincent W. S. Tseng, and Dror Ben-Zeev. 2016. [CrossCheck: toward passive sensing and detection of mental health changes in people with schizophrenia] (http://dartnets.cs.dartmouth.edu/papers/crosscheck_paper553.pdf). In Proceedings of the 2016 ACM International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Ubiquitous Computing (UbiComp '16). Association for Computing Machinery, New York, NY, USA, 886–897.

### Data Contact
[Dror Ben-Zeev] (https://globalhealth.washington.edu/faculty/dror-ben-zeev), University of Washington
[Andrew Campbell] (https://www.cs.dartmouth.edu/~campbell/), Dartmouth College
[Tanzeem Choudhury] (https://tech.cornell.edu/people/tanzeem-choudhury/), Cornell Tech
[John Kane] (https://feinstein.northwell.edu/institutes-researchers/our-researchers/john-m-kane-md),  Northwell Health
Dan Adler (dadler@infosci.cornell.edu)
Weichen Wang (weichen.wang.gr@dartmouth.edu)
